

###############################
CELLNOPT.ADMIN documentation
###############################



Motivation 
###########

The package `cellnopt.admin <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/cellnopt.admin/>`_ provides tools for cellnopt/CellNOptR developers.



.. _installation:

Installation
###################

Since **cellnopt.admin** is available on `PyPi <http://pypi.python.org/>`_, the following command should install the package and its dependencies automatically:: 

    easy_install cellnopt.admin

.. note:: easy_install you may need root permission (under linux, use sudo)
